# Maa Vishhari Sthan Diwari

Maa Vishhari Sthan, also known as Diwari Sthan, is a Hindu temple dedicated to Goddess Vishhari, located in the Saharsa district of Bihar, India. It is a significant religious site, attracting thousands of devotees, especially during festivals like Navratri.
